script:module:
REM ***** BASIC *****
dim MutinySheet as object dim MutinyForm as object
const _MutinyCount = 22
const _MutinyRow = 11 const _MutinyTypeCol = 0 const _MutinyDeckCol = _MutinyTypeCol + 1 const _MutinyHandCol = _MutinyDeckCol + 1 const _MutinyDiscardCol = _MutinyHandCol + 1 const _MutinyRemovedCol = _MutinyDiscardCol + 1 const _MutinyDescCol = _MutinyRemovedCol + 1
const _MutinyCountsRow = _MutinyRow ' We always do e.g. _MutinyRow + cardID, and cardID is 1-22. So the counts are 0. const _MutinyHandCountCol = 1 const _MutinyHandCountRow = 1 const _BuriedMutinyCol = 4 const _BuriedMutinyRow = 6
sub GetMutinySheet if MutinySheet <> NULL then exit sub end if
MutinySheet = ThisComponent.Sheets.getByName("Mutiny") MutinyForm = MutinySheet.DrawPage.Forms.GetByName("formMutiny") end sub
sub DrawMutiny (playerID as integer, optional zarek as boolean) dim cardID, zarekID as integer GetMutinySheet
if GetPlayerName(playerID) = "Tom" then zarek = false elseif IsMissing(zarek) then zarek = true end if
' Check for Zarek if zarek then for zarekID = 1 to PlayerCnt() if GetPlayerName(zarekID) = "Tom" then MsgBox("Don't forget to use Necessary Steps.") end if next zarekID end if
cardID = 1 do until MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyHandCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = "" cardID = cardID + 1 loop MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyHandCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = GetPlayerName(playerID) LogThis(GetPlayerName(playerID) & " draws Mutiny Card: " & MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDeckCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string) ' If we're going to do any post-draw checking, like throwing someone in the Brig, do it here.
' Is the deck empty? If so, move the discards to the deck and shuffle it. cardID = cardID + 1 if MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDeckCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = "" then MsgBox "Mutiny deck empty, reshuffling it."
' Discards are on top of the removed pile. do until cardID > _MutinyCount or MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDiscardCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = "" MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDeckCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDiscardCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDiscardCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = "" cardID = cardID + 1 loop SetBuriedMutiny(true) ShuffleMutinyDeck end if end sub
sub DrawMutinyButton dim playerID as integer
playerID = GetSelected(_ListMutinyPlayers) if playerID < 1 then MsgBox "Please select a player." exit sub end if
if IsRevealed(playerID) and not IsInfiltrating(playerID) then MsgBox GetPlayerName(playerID) & " is a Cylon and cannot draw Mutiny Cards." exit sub end if
DrawMutiny(playerID) UpdateMutinyCardList end sub
sub UpdateMutinyCardList dim playerID, cardID, numcards as integer dim cardlst() as string dim playername as string GetMutinySheet
playerID = GetSelected(_ListMutinyPlayers) if playerID < 1 then MutinyForm.getByName("lstMutinyCards").StringItemList = cardlst() exit sub end if
playername = GetPlayerName(playerID) numcards = 0 for cardID = 1 to _MutinyCount if MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyHandCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = playername then numcards = numcards + 1 redim preserve cardlst(numcards) as string cardlst(numcards) = MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDeckCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string end if next cardID
MutinyForm.getByName("lstMutinyCards").StringItemList = cardlst() MutinyForm.getByName("btnPlayMutiny").enabled = false MutinyForm.getByName("btnDiscardMutiny").enabled = false MutinyForm.getByName("btnBuryMutiny").enabled = false end sub
sub SelectedMutinyCardChanged dim cardID as integer GetMutinySheet
cardID = GetSelected(_ListMutinyCards) MutinyForm.getByName("btnPlayMutiny").enabled = (cardID > 0) MutinyForm.getByName("btnDiscardMutiny").enabled = (cardID > 0) MutinyForm.getByName("btnBuryMutiny").enabled = (cardID > 0) end sub
function GetMutinyHandCout(playerID as integer) as integer GetMutinySheet GetMutinyHandCount = MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyHandCountCol, _MutinyHandCountRow + playerID).value end function
function GetCardIDFromHandID (playerID as integer, handID as integer) as integer dim cardID, match as integer dim player as string
match = 0 player = GetPlayerName(playerID) for cardID = 1 to _MutinyCount if MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyHandCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = player then match = match + 1 if match = handID then GetCardIDFromHandID = cardID exit function end if end if next cardID GetCardIDFromHandID = -1 end function
sub PlayMutinyButton dim playerID, handID, cardID as integer
playerID = GetSelected(_ListMutinyPlayers) if playerID < 1 then MsgBox "Please select a player." exit sub end if
handID = GetSelected(_ListMutinyCards) if handID < 1 then MsgBox "Please choose a Mutiny Card." exit sub end if
cardID = GetCardIDFromHandID(playerID, handID) LogThis(GetPlayerName(playerID) & " plays Mutiny Card: " & MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDeckCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string) if MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyTypeCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = "D" then DiscardMutiny(cardID) elseif MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDeckCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = "Controversial Speech" then if MsgBox("Was Controversial Speech successful?", 4, "Controversial Speech") <> 6 then DiscardMutiny(cardID) else RemoveMutiny(cardID) end if else RemoveMutiny(cardID) endif end sub
sub RemoveMutiny (cardID as integer) dim bottomrow, col as integer dim temp as string GetMutinySheet
' Remove from hand, place in removed column. MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyHandCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = "" MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyRemovedCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDeckCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDeckCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = ""
' Move it to the bottom of the deck. do until MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyRemovedCol, _MutinyRow + cardID + 1).string <> "" or cardID = _MutinyCount for col = _MutinyTypeCol to _MutinyDescCol temp = MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(col, _MutinyRow + cardID + 1).string MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(col, _MutinyRow + cardID + 1).string = MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(col, _MutinyRow + cardID).string MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(col, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = temp next col cardID = cardID + 1 loop
LogThis("Mutiny Card: " & MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyRemovedCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string & " removed from the game.") UpdateMutinyCardList end sub
sub DiscardMutiny (cardID as integer) dim bottomrow, col as integer dim temp as string GetMutinySheet
' Remove from hand, place in discard column. MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyHandCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = "" MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDiscardCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDeckCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDeckCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = ""
' Move it to the bottom of the deck. do until MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDeckCol, _MutinyRow + cardID + 1).string = "" or cardID = _MutinyCount for col = _MutinyTypeCol to _MutinyDescCol temp = MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(col, _MutinyRow + cardID + 1).string MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(col, _MutinyRow + cardID + 1).string = MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(col, _MutinyRow + cardID).string MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(col, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = temp next col cardID = cardID + 1 loop
LogThis("Mutiny Card: " & MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDiscardCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string & " discarded.") UpdateMutinyCardList end sub
sub DiscardAllMutiny (playerID as integer) dim cardID as integer dim player, hand as string GetMutinySheet
cardID = 1 player = GetPlayerName(playerID) do hand = MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyHandCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string if hand = player then DiscardMutiny(cardID) else cardID = cardID + 1 end if loop until hand = "" end sub
sub DiscardMutinyButton dim playerID, handID as integer
playerID = GetSelected(_ListMutinyPlayers) if playerID < 1 then MsgBox "Please select a player." exit sub end if
handID = GetSelected(_ListMutinyCards) if handID < 1 then MsgBox "Please choose a Mutiny Card." exit sub end if
DiscardMutiny(GetCardIDFromHandID(playerID, handID)) end sub
sub BuryMutiny (cardID as integer) dim bottomrow as integer GetMutinySheet
' Remove from hand, but don't place in discard column. MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyHandCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = ""
' Move it to the bottom of the deck. do until MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDeckCol, _MutinyRow + cardID + 1).string = "" or cardID = _MutinyCount for col = _MutinyTypeCol to _MutinyDescCol temp = MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(col, _MutinyRow + cardID + 1).string MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(col, _MutinyRow + cardID + 1).string = MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(col, _MutinyRow + cardID).string MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(col, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = temp next col cardID = cardID + 1 loop SetBuriedMutiny(false) LogThis("Mutiny Card: " & MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDeckCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string & " buried.") UpdateMutinyCardList end sub
sub BuryMutinyButton dim playerID, handID as integer
playerID = GetSelected(_ListMutinyPlayers) if playerID < 1 then MsgBox "Please select a player." exit sub end if
handID = GetSelected(_ListMutinyCards) if handID < 1 then MsgBox "Please choose a Mutiny Card." exit sub end if
BuryMutiny(GetCardIDFromHandID(playerID, handID)) end sub
sub Initialize_Mutiny dim cardID, playerID as integer GetMutinySheet
' Put everything back in the deck. for cardID = 1 to _MutinyCount MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyHandCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = "" if MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDiscardCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string <> "" then MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDeckCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDiscardCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDiscardCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = "" elseif MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyRemovedCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string <> "" then MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDeckCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyRemovedCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyRemovedCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = "" end if next cardID
' Now shuffle the deck. SetBuriedMutiny(true) ShuffleMutinyDeck
for playerID = 1 to PlayerCnt() if GetPlayerName(playerID) = "Tom" then MsgBox "Dealing two Mutiny Cards to Tom Zarek, don't forget to bury one." DrawMutiny(playerID, false) DrawMutiny(playerID, false) end if next playerID UpdateMutinyCardList end sub
sub SetBuriedMutiny (reset as boolean) GetMutinySheet
if reset then MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_BuriedMutinyCol, _BuriedMutinyRow).value = 0 else MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_BuriedMutinyCol, _BuriedMutinyRow).value = MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_BuriedMutinyCol, _BuriedMutinyRow).value + 1 end if end sub
function GetBuriedMutiny as integer GetMutinySheet
GetBuriedMutiny = MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_BuriedMutinyCol, _BuriedMutinyRow).value end function
' The sheet always resets the bury count if it wants a full shuffle. sub ShuffleMutinyDeck dim top, bottom, cardID, swapCard, swapcol as integer dim sortOrder(_MutinyCount) as double dim tempSort as double dim temp as string GetMutinySheet
top = 1 for cardID = 1 to _MutinyCount if MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyHandCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string <> "" then top = cardID + 1 elseif MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutinyDeckCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string <> "" then sortOrder(cardID) = rnd() bottom = cardID end if next cardID bottom = bottom - GetBuriedMutiny
for cardID = top to bottom - 1 for swapCard = cardID + 1 to bottom if sortOrder(cardID) > sortOrder(swapCard) then ' Swap Orders tempSort = sortOrder(cardID) sortOrder(cardID) = sortOrder(swapCard) sortOrder(swapCard) = tempSort
' Swap contents for swapCol = _MutinyTypeCol to _MutinyDescCol temp = MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(swapCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(swapCol, _MutinyRow + cardID).string = MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(swapCol, _MutinyRow + swapCard).string MutinySheet.getCellByPosition(swapCol, _MutinyRow + swapCard).string = temp next SwapCol end if next swapCard next cardID end sub
sub ShuffleMutinyButton
end sub
